law.catch_line: Kentucky Alternative Fuel and Renewable Energy Fund Program -- Purpose.

text.section: There is created in the cabinet a Kentucky Alternative Fuel and Renewable Energy Fund Program to provide funding to Kentucky-based companies to undertake research and development and commercialization work in the area of alternative fuels and renewable energy.

law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 7, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 2007 (2d Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 48, effective August 30, 2007.
